jcr:root.jcr:title: jason.werner@dodgit.com POST on Welcome to the winter sports community (and lets talk snowshoes)!

object.jcr:description: Josh, thanks for setting up the winter sports community! Also, thanks for letting people know about the hiking community calendar. Iâ€™m sure my kids and I will be interested in your class and maybe even making some snowshoes.
